job_description:
Our client in the Fintech industry is seeking a talented and experienced Senior Software Developer to join their dynamic team. If you are passionate about both front-end and back-end technologies, have a deep understanding of JavaScript, React/Redux, SvelteKit, NodeJS, PHP, RESTful APIs, Fastify, and Microservices architecture, we want to hear from you! This is a full-time position. The successful incumbent will work on-site from their headquarters located in Calgary, AB.


Responsibilities:
Technical expertise in both front-end (JavaScript, React/Redux, SvelteKit) and back-end (JavaScript/PHP, NodeJS, RESTful APIs, Fastify, Microservices) development.
Collaborate with the team to design and implement robust and scalable software architecture, including microservices architecture (containers, service mesh, service discovery, API gateway).
Participate actively in hands-on development, including code reviews, debugging, and problem-solving.
Oversee project timelines, ensure the team meets deadlines, and report progress to senior management.
Collaborate with product managers, designers, and other stakeholders to ensure alignment between development efforts and business goals.
Stay updated with industry trends and best practices, and implement process improvements to enhance development efficiency and code quality.
Provide guidance, support, and mentorship to team members, fostering their professional growth and development.


Qualifications:
In-depth knowledge and experience in front-end technologies such as JavaScript, React/Redux, and SvelteKit, as well as back-end technologies including JavaScript/PHP, NodeJS, RESTful APIs, Fastify, and Microservices.
Proficiency in designing and implementing microservices architecture, including containers, service mesh, service discovery, and API gateway.
Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to make critical decisions under pressure.
Excellent communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to effectively convey technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders.
Experience working in Agile development environments.
Willingness and ability to quickly ramp up in new technologies and languages, especially JavaScript and PHP.

Interested?
Apply now, we will be interviewing soon!
